content.text1: This Easter is all about hope. Journey with us as we testify to the hope we've seen, the hope we have yet to see, and the true living hope of the world: Jesus.
This Good Friday we testify to the hope we've seen, and the hope we have yet to see. Join us as we hold forth the hope of Jesus in times of expectation.
